name: Smart WFM
description: Smart WFM is a global human capital management (HCM) consultancy specialising in digital transformation. The company’s service offerings include advisory, implementation and support (including SLA). We are the largest UKG consulting partner in Asia Pacific and offer all types of UKG consulting including Workforce Dimensions (WFD), Workforce Central (WFC), Workforce Ready (WFR) and advanced API integration including Dell Boomi. Find out more about our UKG services. Our team are based across Australia, Singapore, Philippines, India and USA.
business_objectives: Reduce the Cost of Hiring Qualified Employees
Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Headline: Personalised outcome based services under SLA to support your business initiatives
ShortDescription: Smart WFM is a global human capital management (HCM) consultancy specialising in digital transformation. The company’s service offerings include advisory, implementation and support (including SLA).
enhanced_description: Smart WFM is a global human capital management (HCM) consultancy specializing in digital transformation, providing personalized, outcome-based services under SLA to support business initiatives. Their core service offerings include advisory, implementation, and support for HCM systems. As the largest UKG consulting partner in Asia Pacific, they offer comprehensive consulting services for UKG products such as Workforce Dimensions (WFD), Workforce Central (WFC), and Workforce Ready (WFR), along with advanced API integration expertise, including Dell Boomi. Smart WFM operates with a global team located across Australia, Singapore, Philippines, India, and the USA.
key_use_cases: Advisory services for HCM and business strategies
Implementation of UKG Workforce Dimensions, Workforce Central, and Workforce Ready systems
Ongoing support for UKG HCM/WFM environments (including SLA-backed services)
Advanced API integration for HCM platforms, specifically involving Dell Boomi
Project management for HCM technology initiatives
competitive_advantages: Largest UKG consulting partner in Asia Pacific
Global presence with teams across Australia, Singapore, Philippines, India, and USA
Offers personalized, outcome-based services under SLA
Specialization in digital transformation within HCM
Expertise in advanced API integration, including Dell Boomi
implementation_scenarios: New implementations of UKG Workforce Dimensions, Workforce Central, or Workforce Ready
Upgrades or migrations of existing UKG systems
Digital transformation projects involving HCM technology
roi_benefits: Reduce the Cost of Hiring Qualified Employees
Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
